message.raw:
Adjusted original IndexedMzML implementation to reuse as much of the existing
IndexedXML machinery as possible. An open issue remains as to whether to try
to fall back on the byte offset indexing procedure in the event that the specialized
index method fails/detects corrupted values.

message:
Adjusted original IndexedMzML implementation to reuse as much of the existing
IndexedXML machinery as possible. An open issue remains as to whether to try
